<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 156 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Archaeologist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=46)

[Archaeologist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1879)

---

While study is key to your success, a bit of magic is a helpful tool in discovering the secrets of the past. You gain [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), and [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) as occult innate cantrips.
